General.Name: Metro Healthcare Indonesia
General.Description: PT Metro Healthcare Indonesia Tbk operates and manages hospitals in Indonesia. The company owns and operates 7 hospitals. It also engages in development, trade, industry, land transportation, agriculture, printing and services. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Metro Healthcare Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Metro Healthcare International.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Serang Km 16,8, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15710
